nodes.documentation: This contract is used to combine all the basic requirements of a Crowdsale at one place
nodes.name: CrowdsaleCredentials
setEndTime
resetStartTime

nodes.documentation:
@dev - It is used to set the ending time of the crowdsale
@return - It checks whether the operation got success or not
nodes.name: resetEndTime
setTargetAmountOfTokens
setMinimumAmountOfTokens
